task.title: Map a test case to a qTest test case by database ID

li.p: The test case you wish to upload must locate in the integrated test case folder with qTest. To learn more about integrating a test case folder with qTest, refer to step 4 in manual setup. See above: .

taskbody.context: provides an easy way to map a Katalon test case to an existing qTest test case. Follow these steps:

step.cmd: In qTest, you can get a qTest test case database ID in the test case URL.
In , select a test case you want to link to the above qTest test case. Add the copied value to its name in the following format: <qTest Database ID> <Katalon test case name>.
Open the test case editor, select the Integration tab.

image.alt: Link qTest test case by database ID

step.cmd: Save your change when the test case is linked to qTest successfully.

image.alt: Link test case by database ID successfully
